channel.title: Database on Not a Peeker of Nature
channel.description: Recent content in Database on Not a Peeker of Nature

item.title: Tools in bioinformatics
item.description:
#Dataset

Multiomics (bulk cell):

  1. bulk ATAC-seq database https://academic.oup.com/nar/article/49/D1/D55/5943839
  2. bulk ChIP-seq and ATAC-seq database https://chip-atlas.org/
  3. Other ATAC-seq or ChIP-seq data can be downloaded from GEO (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/) or Encode https://www.encodeproject.org/matrix/?type=Experiment&control_type!=*&status=released&perturbed=false
  4. roadmap (https://egg2.wustl.edu/roadmap)

Multiomics (single cell):

  1. single cell database: https://data.humancellatlas.org/
  2. human tumor: https://humantumoratlas.org/

Genome and annotations:

  1. UCSC for genome https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/downloads.html (eg. https://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/dm3/)
  2. Ensembl for refgenes annotations https://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/

sybapse

ypf2944164500@gmail.com
@ypf19950216

Summary of online resources in genomics

Appendix1: Kingfisher is a package for downloading fastq data

kingfisher get -p PRJNA938179 -m aws-http prefetch aws-cp gcp-cp ena-ftp -f fastq --check-md5sums
kingfisher get -p PRJNA938179 -m aws-http prefetch aws-cp gcp-cp ena-ftp -t 16 -f fastq.gz --check-md5sums
kingfisher get -r SRR12044307 -m aws-http prefetch aws-cp gcp-cp ena-ftp -f fastq --check-md5sums
kingfisher get -r SRR12044307 -m aws-http prefetch aws-cp gcp-cp ena-ftp -t 16 -f fastq.gz --check-md5sums

kingfisher get --run-identifiers-list srr_list.txt -m aws-http prefetch aws-cp gcp-cp ena-ftp -t 16 -f fastq.gz --check-md5sums
srr_list.txt <
SRR12044304
SRR12044305
SRR12044306
SRR12044307
SRR12044308
SRR12044309

Appendix2: aria2c
